H0.text: Which treaty was signed in March 1918 signalling Russia's exit from World War 1. Treaty of Versailles

H1.text: Which treaty was signed in March 1918 signalling Russia's exit from World War 1. Treaty of Berlin

H2.text: Which treaty was signed in March 1918 signalling Russia's exit from World War 1. Treaty of London

H3.text: Which treaty was signed in March 1918 signalling Russia's exit from World War 1. Брест

A4.text: The Treaty of Brest-Litovsk was a separate peace treaty signed on 3 March 1918 between Soviet Russia and the Central Powers.
